ranil wika්ramasinhata manynyan dayi yuanpi karayo ma pa්rashna karathi.ese ahanne kisima rajya nayakayakuta mella karannata bari pa්rabhakaran namwu maha bhayanaka tha්rasthawadiya dan uthure bim kadakata kotu kara sitiyadi ohuge anasaka yatathe hira karagena sitina demala wasiyan muda ganime awasana meheyuma uthure sidu karaddi ranil wika්ramasinha rata pawa dime kontha්raththuwakata yuropaya sawari gasanne pissuwak nisama wiya yuthuya.rata pawa dena ithihasayakata nakam kiyana don juwan parapure aluth ma puruka saha norwe palliye samipa hithawathaku wana ranilta me kalakanni gamana yannata upades dunne ranil nathi karannata manga padana ohuge ma madhya nadayayi.

sarasawi sisu sisuwiyange sarasawi jiwithaye siduwim aashrithawa nirmanaya wu hanthane kathawa, wishwawidyala sisu sisuwiyange prashna pilibanda gambauru deshapalana kiyawimakin wiyuktha wuwada, ehi ranganaye, sangithaye nawum githawaliye wu aakarshanaya hethu kotagena ada dakwama prekshaka mathakaye randi athi chithrapatayak bawata path wi atha.

aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage wishesha sanwardhana wyapruthi yatathe shighra diyunuwak labaathi, gampaha pradeshaye mema udyanayada elesama sanwardhanaya kirimata katayuthu kalayuthu bawath kiya.idiri sanwardhana katayuthu waladi pradeshiya sanwardhana kamitu raswimwalatada mema sanwardhana yojana idiripathkota pradeshiya lekamwaru samangada sakachchakota katayuthu kala yuthu bawada amathiwaraya adala niladharin danuwath kaleya.mema yojitha sanwardhana ilakkaya sandaha wayawana mudala asthamenthu sakasimen pasu sandahankala haki bawath, mema katayuthu sarthaka kara ganimata apa departhamenthuwe adhyaksha janaral aacharya siril wijesundara mahatha athulu athireka lekam aananda wijesuriya saha anikuth niladharinge kapawima agaya karana bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.
